full_output.summary: Enthusiastic and dedicated student with a strong academic background in Finance and Marketing, seeking a Finance/Marketing internship to apply my knowledge and gain practical experience. Eager to bring fresh insights and a unique perspective to your company, I aim to contribute to your success while acquiring hands-on experience in the finance and marketing sectors.

projects.name: Investment Banking Job Simulation on Forage
projects.description: Identified an ideal M&A target for a client based on an assessment of their strategic and financial criteria. Constructed a DCF model to calculate the valuation of the M&A target and adjusted the model to account for a competitor bid and supply chain interruption. Created a 2-pager for the client containing a company profile and summary of the auction process.
